mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ext_relationship_pool ( workspace_id, task_id, doc_id, paragraph_index, source_entity_id, target_entity_id, relationship_type, status, valid_flag, del_flag, create_by, creator_id, create_time, update_by, updater_id, update_time, remark ) VALUES
( #{item.workspaceId}, #{item.taskId}, #{item.docId}, #{item.paragraphIndex}, #{item.sourceEntityId}, #{item.targetEntityId}, #{item.relationshipType}, #{item.status}, #{item.validFlag}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.creatorId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updaterId}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark} )
